alert.note: Alert for Davis; Morgan; Salt Lake; Summit; Tooele; Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued January 09 at 6:39PM MST until January 09 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM MST FOR SALT LAKE...SOUTHEASTERN DAVIS...SOUTH CENTRAL MORGAN...WESTERN SUMMIT... NORTHWESTERN UTAH AND EAST CENTRAL TOOELE COUNTIES... At 638 PM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located 17 miles west of Corinne, or 19 miles southwest of Tremonton, and is moving southeast at 55 mph. Wind gusts in excess of 60 mph have been observed. HAZARD...Intense bursts of heavy snow and gusty winds leading to blowing snow and rapidly falling visibility. Wind gusts greater than 50 mph could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. SOURCE...Radar and webcams. IMPACT...Dangerous and life-threatening travel conditions are expected to develop rapidly in the warning area. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 284 and 313. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 89 and 106, and between mile markers 108 and 143. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Sandy, Murray, Bountiful, Tooele, Grantsville, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Lehi, Draper, Riverton, Cottonwood Heights, Midvale, Holladay, South Salt Lake, Herriman, North Salt Lake, and Alpine. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions. Consider avoiding or delaying travel until the snow squall passes your location. If you must travel, use extra caution and allow extra time. Rapid changes in visibility and slick road conditions may lead to accidents. SNOW SQUALL...OBSERVED SNOW SQUALL IMPACT...SIGNIFICANT

area.areaDesc: Davis; Morgan; Salt Lake; Summit; Tooele; Utah
